summary: Legend Has it the Gods have placed a Powerful Hammer where the final battle with Alduin is gonna be, Some say it's just a myth or could it be that the gods planned every step through the Dragonborn Prophecy!
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#674ea7][size=3][b]Put The Hammer of Justice into Skyrim It's in sovngarde it's OP it's at Alduin's Perch(Word Wall in Sovngarde)!

Legend Has it the Gods have placed a Powerful Hammer where the final battle with Alduin is gonna be, Some say it's just a myth or could it be that the gods planned every step through the Dragonborn Prophecy!

[/b][color=#cc0000][size=5][b][u]ATTENTION: This is not Lore-Friendly nor balanced so if you don't want a OP weapon steer clear of this mod!!!

[/u][/b][/size][/color][color=#900000][size=6][b]Permissions:
[/b][/size][/color][color=#900000][size=6][b]NEXUS ONLY NO UPLOADING OF ANY KIND![/b][/size][/color][b]
